lead_paragraph: Virat Kohli became the first Indian captain to post a test double century overseas as the tourists played their way into a virtually unbeatable position on the second day of the first test against West Indies in Antigua on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Kohli Makes History as India Take Command
headline.main: Kohli Makes History as India Take Command

snippet: Virat Kohli became the first Indian captain to post a test double century overseas as the tourists played their way into a virtually unbeatable position on the second day of the first test against West Indies in Antigua on Friday....
